column3: 2015. graveside services for duane parker redfoot
column8: at 10:00 a. m. at the red knoll cemetery. he will be taken to ambie redfoot's home in whiterocks on thursday at 4:00 p. m. services under the direction of the hullinger mortuary. condolences. aunt bea and sister lanna. oh parker we are going to miss you so much
column9: going to miss seeing your smiling face
column10: calling me cb aunt bea. your sister is going to miss you calling her sis. we are sad you had to leave us but the creator had other plans for you. rip nephew and brother. gone but never forgotten. leave condolence. fromemail (optional)message
